song_name: Best Band in the Universe feat Ninja Brian
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Best Band in the Universe feat Ninja Brian is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Best Band in the Universe feat Ninja Brian has sections analyzed in the following keys: F♯ Minor, D♯ Minor, F Minor,  and F♯ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
